title: T's Tantan
description: Vegan ramen restaurant. Also serves salads and a few other main course options. Last order 10pm. Located inside Tokyo Station so you must be taking a train or you must buy a platform ticket. Find the food and shopping area known as Keiyo Street and you will be able to find the restaurant. Japanese name and address: T's たんたん：東京駅構内１F京葉ストリート.
